mapper.select: SELECT id, article_categories AS article_categories, categories_explain AS categories_explain, founder, create_time AS create_time, status FROM article_categories WHERE status = 1

SELECT ac.id, ac.article_categories AS article_categories, ac.categories_explain AS categories_explain, ac.founder, ac.create_time AS create_time, ac.status, COUNT(a.id) AS articleCount FROM article_categories ac LEFT JOIN article a ON ac.article_categories = a.category AND a.status = 1 WHERE ac.status = 1 GROUP BY ac.id, ac.article_categories, ac.categories_explain, ac.founder, ac.create_time, ac.status ORDER BY ac.create_time DESC

SELECT a.id, a.article_id, a.article_name AS title, a.excerpt, a.article_cover AS image, a.create_time AS date, u.username AS author, a.category, a.alias, t.tag FROM ( SELECT id, uuid, article_id FROM article WHERE status = 1 AND category = #{category} ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit} ) page JOIN article a ON page.id = a.id JOIN user_information u ON page.uuid = u.uuid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT article_id, GROUP_CONCAT(article_tag) AS tag FROM article_tag_relation GROUP BY article_id ) t ON page.article_id = t.article_id
